label: Behavior 52272239
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving northward with a slight westerly drift, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 54.4967 + 0.0068 × t, lon(t) ≈ 13.7163 - 0.00002 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
